title: Curry Corner
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Japanese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Vietnamese, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small restaurant in a house, offers a mixture of Thai, Indian, Vietnamese, and Japanese food.  Spicy chickpea curry is vegan, pad thai and veggie don burrie can be made vegan when requested. Specify you are vegan as some sauces contain fish sauce.
